description.value:
Tiamat can use her Frightful Presence. She then makes three attacks: two with her claws and one with her tail.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +19 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 4d6 + @mod type=slashing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +19 to hit, reach 25 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 4d8 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Each creature of Tiamat’s choice that is within 240 feet of Tiamat and aware of her must succeed on a [[/save wis 26 format=long]] or become &Reference[frightened]{frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature’s saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Tiamat’s Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

Tiamat can take 5 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature’s turn. Tiamat regains spent legendary actions at the start of her turn.

Tiamat’s legendary action options are associated with her five &Reference[dragon]{dragon} heads (a bite and a breath weapon for each). Once Tiamat chooses a legendary action option for one of her heads, she can’t choose another one associated with that head until the start of her next turn.

Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +19 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 4d10 + @mod type=slashing average=true]] damage plus [[/damage 4d6 type=acid average=true]] damage (black &Reference[dragon]{dragon} head), &Reference[lightning]{lightning} damage (blue &Reference[dragon]{dragon} head), &Reference[poison]{poison} damage (green &Reference[dragon]{dragon} head), &Reference[fire]{fire} damage (red &Reference[dragon]{dragon} head), or &Reference[cold]{cold} damage (white &Reference[dragon]{dragon} head).

Black &Reference[dragon]{Dragon} Head: &Reference[acid]{Acid} Breath (Costs 2 Actions). Tiamat exhales &Reference[acid]{acid} in a 120-foot &Reference[line]{line} that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that &Reference[line]{line} must make a [[/save dex 27 format=long]], taking [[/damage 15d8 type=acid average=true]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Blue &Reference[dragon]{Dragon} Head: &Reference[lightning]{Lightning} Breath (Costs 2 Actions). Tiamat exhales &Reference[lightning]{lightning} in a 120-foot &Reference[line]{line} that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that &Reference[line]{line} must make a [[/save dex 27 format=long]], taking [[/damage 16d10 type=lightning average=true]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Green &Reference[dragon]{Dragon} Head: &Reference[poison]{Poison} Breath (Costs 2 Actions). Tiamat exhales poisonous gas in a 90-foot &Reference[cone]{cone}. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save con 27 format=long]], taking [[/damage 22d6 type=poison average=true]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Red &Reference[dragon]{Dragon} Head: &Reference[fire]{Fire} Breath (Costs 2 Actions). Tiamat exhales &Reference[fire]{fire} in a 90-foot &Reference[cone]{cone}. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save dex 27 format=long]], taking [[/damage 26d6 type=fire average=true]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

White &Reference[dragon]{Dragon} Head: &Reference[cold]{Cold} Breath (Costs 2 Actions). Tiamat exhales an icy blast in a 90-foot &Reference[cone]{cone}. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save dex 27 format=long]], taking [[/damage 16d8 type=cold average=true]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +19 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 4d10 + @mod type=slashing average=true]] damage plus [[/damage 4d6 type=acid average=true]] damage (black &Reference[dragon]{dragon} head), &Reference[lightning]{lightning} damage (blue &Reference[dragon]{dragon} head), &Reference[poison]{poison} damage (green &Reference[dragon]{dragon} head), &Reference[fire]{fire} damage (red &Reference[dragon]{dragon} head), or &Reference[cold]{cold} damage (white &Reference[dragon]{dragon} head).

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Tiamat exhales &Reference[acid]{acid} in a 120-foot &Reference[line]{line} that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that &Reference[line]{line} must make a [[/save dex 27 format=long]], taking [[/damage 15d8 type=acid average=true]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

description.value:
Discorporation. When Tiamat drops to 0 hit points or dies, her body is destroyed but her essence travels back to her domain in the Nine Hells, and she is unable to take physical form for a time.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Innate Spellcasting (3/Day). Tiamat can innately cast divine word (spell save DC 26). Her spellcasting ability is &Reference[cha]{Charisma}.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Legendary Resistance (5/Day). If Tiamat fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Limited Magic Immunity. Unless she wishes to be affected, Tiamat is immune to spells of 6th level or lower. She has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Magic Weapons. Tiamat’s weapon attacks are magical.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Multiple Heads. Tiamat can take one reaction per turn, rather than only one per round. She also has advantage on saving throws against being knocked &Reference[unconscious]{unconscious}. If she fails a saving throw against an effect that would stun a creature, one of her unspent legendary actions is spent.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Regeneration. Tiamat regains [[/damage 30 type=heal average=false]] hit points at the start of her turn.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
